then we caused them to fall into deep sleep for many year inside the cave
then we woke them up again so that we might see which of the two group would better calculate the time they had stayed there
we shall tell you their story a it really wa they were young men who believed in their lord and on whom we bestowed further guidance

we strengthened their heart when they rose up and declared our lord is the lord of the heaven and the earth never shall we call upon any deity other than him for that would be an outrageous thing to do
these people of ours have taken deity other than him why do they not produce clear evidence about them who is more wicked than the man who invents falsehood against god

now that you have withdrawn from them and from all that they worship instead of god take refuge in that cave your lord will extend his mercy to you and will make fitting provision for you in your situation

the sun could be observed to incline away from their cave on the right a it rose and to turn away from them on the left when it set while they lay in the wide space inside the cave this is one of the sign of god he whom god guide is rightly guided but for him whom he let go astray you will find no helper or guide

you would have thought they were awake though they lay asleep we turned them over to the right and the left while their dog lay at the cave entrance with leg outstretched had you looked down and seen them you would have surely turned your back and fled in terror

in the course of time we raised them up again so that they might question one another one of them asked how long have you stayed here they said we have stayed day or part of day but others said your lord know best how long you have stayed here let one of you go then with these silver coin to the town and let him find out what food is purest there and bring you back supply of it let him conduct himself with caution and not disclose your whereabouts to anyone
for if they find you out they will stone you to death or force you back into their faith in that case you would never prosper

thus we disclosed thing to them so that they might know that god promise wa true and there wa no doubt about the hour judgement day the people argued about them among themselves they said build monument over them their lord know best concerning them those who prevailed in their affair said let u surely build place of worship over them

some will say they were three the fourth wa their dog and others will say they were five the sixth wa their dog guessing at random and yet others say they were seven the eighth wa their dog say my lord know best their number only few know anything about them therefore do not enter into controversy over them nor seek information about them from any of them
never say of anything shall certainly do this tomorrow
without adding if god so will remember your lord whenever you might forget and say trust my lord will guide me to that which is even nearer to the right path than this
some say they stayed in their cave three hundred year and to that some have added another nine year

say god know best how long they stayed in it only god ha knowledge of the unseen in the heaven and on the earth how well he see and how well he hears man ha no other guardian besides him he allows none to share his sovereignty
proclaim what ha been revealed to you from your lord book none can change his word you shall find no refuge besides him

keep yourself attached to those who call on their lord morning and evening seeking his pleasure and do not let your eye turn away from them desiring the attraction of worldly life and do not obey one whose heart we have made heedless of our remembrance one who pursues his own whim and becomes dissolute

say this is the truth from your lord let him who will believe in it and him who will deny it for the wrongdoer we have prepared fire which will cover them like canopy and if they beg for water they will be given water a hot a molten lead which will scald their face how dreadful drink and how evil resting place
a for those who believe and do good deed we do not let the reward of anyone who doe good deed go to waste

they shall dwell in the garden of eternity where river flow at their foot reclining upon raised couch they will be adorned with bracelet of gold and will wear green robe of fine silk and heavy brocade an excellent reward and an excellent resting place
recite to them the parable of two men one of them we provided with two vineyard which we surrounded with date palm and placed field of grain in between
each garden produced it fruit and did not fail to yield it best we even caused river to gush forth in the midst of them
and so he had fruit in abundance while conversing with his companion he said am wealthier than you are and have bigger following
having thus harmed his own soul he entered his garden saying do not think this will ever perish
and do not believe that the hour will ever come even if am returned to my lord shall surely find better place than this
his companion replied in the course of their discussion do you deny him who created you from dust from small drop of fluid then formed you into man
but a far a am concerned god alone is my lord and set up no partner with him
when you entered your garden why did you not say that which god will will surely come to pas there is no power save with god although you see have le wealth and offspring than you
my lord may well give me garden better than yours and send down thunderbolt from heaven upon your vineyard turning it into barren waste
or it water may sink into the earth so that you will never be able to find it again

so it wa and all his fruit wa destroyed the vine had all fallen down on their trellis and their owner wrung his hand bewailing all that he had spent on his garden he said would that had not associated anyone with my lord
he had no party to help him against god nor wa he able to defend himself
the only support is from god the true god he is the best in rewarding and the best in respect of the final outcome

give them an example about worldly life it is like the vegetation of the earth that thrives when watered by the rain which we send down from the sky and then it all becomes stubble which the wind blow away god ha power over all thing
wealth and child are an ornament of the life of this world but deed of lasting merit are better rewarded by your lord and far better source of hope
the day we shall make the mountain move and you will see the earth laid bare and we shall gather all mankind together and shall not leave any one of them behind

they will be ranged before your lord standing in row and he will say to them now you have come to u a we created you at first but you supposed that we would not appoint the time for the fulfillment of our promise to you

the book of deed will be placed before them and you will see the guilty apprehensive about it content they will say woe to u what record this is it doe not leave any deed small or large unaccounted for they will find everything they ever did laid in front of them your lord will not be unjust to anyone

when we said to the angel prostrate yourselves before adam all prostrated themselves except satan he wa one of the jinni and he disobeyed his lord command do you then take him and his offspring a protector instead of me despite their enmity towards you this is an evil exchange for the wrongdoer
did not call them to witness at the creation of the heaven and the earth nor at their own creation do not take a my helper those who lead others astray
on that day he will say to them call on those whom you thought to be my partner and they will call on them but their prayer will not be heard and we shall place barrier of enmity between them
the guilty shall see the fire and realize that they are going to fall into it they shall find no way of escape from it
we have explained in various way in this quran for the benefit of mankind all kind of example but man is most contentious

nothing prevents people from believing when they are given guidance or from asking forgiveness of their lord but the fact that the fate of the previous people should befall them or to have the punishment come upon them face to face
we only send the messenger to bring good news and to give warning those who deny use fallacious argument to nullify the truth treating my revelation and my warning a jest

who is more wicked than he who ha been reminded of the revelation of his lord then turn away from them and forgets what his own hand have done we have cast veil over their heart lest they understand our word and made them hard of hearing call them a you may to the right path they shall never be guided

your lord is the forgiving one the possessor of mercy if he had to take them to task for the wrong they have done he would have hastened their punishment they have an appointed time beyond which there will be no escape for them
we destroyed these community when they went on doing wrong and we appointed time for their destruction
recall how moses said to his servant shall not give up until reach the place where both sea meet even if it take me year
but when at last they came to the land where the two sea met they forgot their fish and it swiftly made it way into the sea
after they had passed the place moses said to his young companion bring u our morning meal we have indeed been fatigued by this journey
he replied did you see when we were resting by the rock that forgot the fish satan made me forget it so did not mention it it made it way to the sea in miraculous way
moses said that is just what we were looking for so they went back the way they had come
and they found one of our servant to whom we had granted our mercy and had given knowledge from ourself
moses said to him may follow you so that you may guide me by what you have been taught
he replied you will not be able to bear with me patiently
how could you be patient in matter beyond your knowledge
moses said god willing you will find me patient and will not disobey you in any thing
he said well then if you would follow me do not ask me about anything till speak of it to you
so they set out but when they got into boat the man made hole in it moses exclaimed have you made hole in the boat to drown the people in it you have indeed done dreadful thing
he replied did not tell you that you would never be able to bear with me patiently
he said do not take me to task for what have forgotten and do not be hard on me on account of what have done
so they travelled on then they met young boy and the man killed him moses said have you slain an innocent person without his having slain anyone indeed you have done terrible thing
the man said did not tell you that you would not be able to have any patience with me
moses replied if ever ask you about anything after this do not let me accompany you will have given you sufficient excuse

so they went on until they came to town they asked it people for food but were refused hospitality they found wall in the town which wa about to fall down his companion buttressed it and moses said had you wished you could have demanded payment for your labour
he answered this is where you and must part company but first will tell you the meaning of the thing you could not bear with patiently
the boat belonged to some poor people who made their living from the sea wanted to damage it because there wa king coming behind them who wa seizing every boat by force
a for the youth his parent were believer and we feared that he would trouble them by rebellion and denial of truth
we wanted their lord to replace him with someone purer than him and more compassionate

the wall belonged to two young orphan in the town whose father had been righteous man and treasure of theirs lay underneath it so your lord wanted them to come of age and then to dig up their treasure a mercy from him did not do it of my own accord that is the explanation of the thing about which you were not able to restrain yourself
they will ask you about dhu qarnayn say will give you an account of him
we established him in the land and gave him the mean to achieve all thing
he travelled on certain road

until when he reached the setting of the sun he found it setting in spring of murky water and near it he found some people we said dhu qarnayn you can either punish them or else you can treat them with gentleness
he said we shall certainly punish him who doe wrong then he shall be brought back to his lord who will punish him with grievous punishment
but whoever belief and doe good work shall have good reward and we shall facilitate his matter by our command
then he followed yet another path
until he came to the rising place of the sun where he found it rising on people for whom we had provided no shelter from it
thus indeed it wa we had full knowledge of him
then he followed still another path
until he came between two mountain he found beside them people who could scarcely understand word of his language
they said dhu qarnayn gog and magog are causing corruption in the land so may we pay you tribute on condition that you set barrier between u and them
he said what my lord ha given me is better than any tribute help me with force of labourer and will erect barrier between you and them

bring me block of iron then when he had filled the gap between the mountain side he said now blow on the fire with your bellow when the iron block were red with heat he said bring me molten brass to pour on them
so they gog and magog were not able to scale it nor were they able to bore through it
and he said this is mercy from my lord but when the promise of my lord come to pas he will level it to dust my lord promise is ever true
on that day we shall let them surge against each other like wave and then the trumpet will be blown and we shall gather them all together
on that day we shall lay hell bare before those who deny the truth
who have turned blind eye to my reminder and deaf ear to my warning
do those who deny the truth think that they can make my servant patron instead of me we have reserved hell a lodging for those who deny the truth
say shall tell you of those who will lose the most through their action
they are those whose effort have been wasted in the life of the world while they thought they were doing good
they are those who deny their lord sign and the meeting with him so their work are in vain and we shall give them no weight on the day of resurrection
hell will be their reward because they denied the truth and made jest of my sign and my messenger
those who believe and do good work shall have the garden of paradise for their abode
they shall forever dwell in the garden of paradise desiring no change
tell them if the ocean became ink for writing the word of my lord surely the ocean would be exhausted before the word of my lord came to an end even if we were to add another ocean to it
say am only human being like yourselves it is revealed to me that your god is one god so let him who hope to meet his lord do good deed and let him associate no one else in the worship of his lord
kaf ha ya ayn sad
this is an account of your lord mercy bestowed upon his servant zachariah
when he called upon his lord in low tone saying
lord my bone have weakened and my head ha turned hoary with age but never lord have been disappointed in my prayer to you
now fear my kinsman when am gone have no hope of their continuing my mission for my wife is barren so grant me successor from yourself
to be my heir and to be the heir of the blessing of the house of jacob and make him my lord acceptable to you
zachariah we bring you good news of son whose name shall be john we have not given such name to anyone before
my lord said zachariah how shall have son when my wife is barren and have reached such extreme old age
he said it will be so your lord say it is easy for me for created you when you were nothing before
he said my lord grant me sign he said your sign will be that you will not speak to anyone for three successive day and night although sound in body
then zachariah came forth from the shrine to his people and told them by sign to glorify the lord morning and evening
to john we said hold fast the book and while he wa still child we bestowed upon him wisdom
and tenderness of heart and purity he wa pious
and dutiful towards his parent and wa not haughty or disobedient
peace be on him on the day of his birth and on the day of his death and peace will be on him on the day he is raised up to life again
recount in the book how mary withdrew from her people to an eastern place
and kept herself in seclusion from them we sent her our angel who presented himself to her a full grown human being
when she saw him she said seek refuge in the compassionate god from you do not come near if you fear the lord
am only the messenger of your lord he replied shall bestow upon you the gift of son endowed with purity
she said how can have son when no man ha touched me and neither have been unchaste
the angel replied so shall it be your lord say this is easy for me and we shall make him sign to people and blessing from u this ha been decreed
so she conceived him and withdrew with him to distant place
the pain of labour drove her to the trunk of date palm she said oh if only had died before this and passed into oblivion
but voice called out to her from below do not despair your lord ha provided brook that run at your foot
and if you shake the trunk of this palm tree it will drop fresh ripe date on you
eat and drink and rejoice and if you see any human being say have vowed fast of silence to the gracious god and will not speak with any human being today
carrying her child she brought him to her people they said mary you have indeed done something terrible
sister of aaron your father wa not an evil man nor wa your mother an unchaste woman
she pointed to the child they said how shall we talk to someone who is child in the cradle
but he said am god servant he ha given me the book and made me prophet
he ha made me blessed wherever may be and ha enjoined upon me prayer and almsgiving throughout my life
he ha made me dutiful toward my mother and he ha not made me arrogant or wicked
blessed wa on the day wa born and blessed shall be on the day die and on the day am raised to life again
such wa jesus the son of mary that is the whole truth about which they still dispute
it doe not befit the majesty of god that he should beget son glory be to him he is far above that when he decree something he say only be and it is
god is my lord and your lord so worship him alone that is the right path
yet different group differed among themselves how awful it will be for those who have rejected the truth when dreadful day arrives
how sharp of hearing how sharp of sight they will be when they come to u but today these evil doer are obviously lost in error
warn them of the coming of the day of remorse when everything will have been decided while they are heedless and do not believe
it is we who will inherit the earth and all who dwell upon it they shall all return to u
also recount the story of abraham in the book he wa man of truth and prophet
he said to his father why do you worship something that can neither hear nor see nor benefit you in any way
father have been given some knowledge which ha not come to you so follow me shall guide you along straight path
father do not worship satan for truly satan is rebel against the most gracious one
father indeed fear lest punishment from the gracious one afflict you and you become friend of satan
his father said do you reject my deity abraham if you do not desist shall surely stone you to death keep out of my way
abraham replied peace be on you will pray to my lord for your forgiveness he ha indeed been gracious to me
will separate myself from you and from whatever you call upon besides god and will pray only to my lord it may well be that in calling on my lord will not be disappointed
so when he had separated himself from them and from what they worshipped besides god we bestowed on him isaac and jacob and we made each of them prophet
we granted them our mercy and bestowed on them true and high renown
tell also of moses in the book he wa indeed chosen one and wa messenger and prophet
we called out to him from the right side of the mount and made him draw near to be in close communion with u
and we gave him a his helper out of our mercy his brother aaron having made him prophet
tell also of ishmael in the book he wa true to his promise and wa messenger and prophet
he exhorted his people to prayer and almsgiving and his lord wa pleased with him
tell also of idris in the book he wa man of truth and prophet
we raised him to high position

these are the one whom god ha favoured the prophet from among the descendant of adam and of those whom we carried in the ark with noah the descendant of abraham of israel and of those whom we have guided and chosen for when the revelation of the merciful were recited to them they fell down prostrating themselves and weeping
but then they were succeeded by generation who neglected their prayer and were driven by their own desire they will assuredly meet with destruction
except for those who repent and believe and do good deed these will enter heaven and they will not be wronged in the least
theirs shall be the garden of eden which the all merciful ha promised to his servant without their having seen them and most surely his promise shall be fulfilled
they will not hear therein anything vain only greeting of peace they will receive their provision there morning and evening
that is the garden which we will grant to those of our servant who have been god fearing
we never descend except at your lord command what is before u and behind u and all that lie between belong to him your lord is not forgetful
he is the lord of the heaven and of the earth and of all that is between the two so worship him alone and be steadfast in his worship do you know of anyone equal to him in his attribute
man asks when am once dead shall be raised to life
but doe man not remember that we created him when he wa nothing before
by your lord we shall most surely gather them and the devil too and bring them close to hell on their knee
then we shall carry off from every group those who were most stubborn in their opposition to the gracious one
we surely know best those most deserving of the fire of hell
and there is not one of you but shall pas through it decree from your lord which must be fulfilled
then we shall save those who feared god but the wrongdoer shall be left there on their knee
when our clear revelation are recited to them those who deny the truth say to the faithful which of the two side is better in respect of position and make more impressive assembly
we have destroyed so many generation before them who surpassed them in material power and splendour

say the gracious one grant respite for time to those who are in error until when they are confronted with what they are promised either in punishment in the world or in the approach of the hour they will realize who is worse in respect of position and who is weaker in resource
god increase his guidance to those who follow guidance and lasting good work are better in the sight of your lord and are most rewarding
have you seen him who denies the truth in our revelation and say shall certainly be given wealth and child
ha he looked to the unseen or ha he made pledge to the merciful one
indeed not we shall record what he say and shall prolong the punishment for him
we shall inherit all that he boast of and he will come to u all alone
they have taken other deity besides god so that they may be source of strength for them
but they shall reject their worship and turn against them
do you not see that we have appointed devil to incite those who deny the truth to disobedience
so take no hasty action against them their day are numbered
the day will surely come when we shall gather the god fearing like honoured guest before the compassionate god
and we shall drive the sinful like thirsty herd into hell
no one will have power to intercede except for those who have permission from the lord of mercy
they say the gracious one ha begotten son
assuredly you have uttered monstrous falsehood
the heaven might well nigh burst thereat and the earth break asunder and the mountain fall down in piece
because they ascribe son to the gracious one
it doe not become the majesty of the compassionate god to take to himself son
there is none in the heaven or on the earth but shall return to the merciful in utter submission
he ha counted them and numbered them precisely
each one of them shall come to him one by one on the day of judgement
the lord of mercy will bestow affection upon those who believe and perform righteous deed
we have made it the quran easy in your own language prophet so that you may convey glad news to the righteous and give warning to stubborn people
how many generation we have destroyed before them can you find single one of them alive now or hear so much a whisper from them
ta ha
we have not sent the quran down to you to distress you
but only a an exhortation for him who fear god
it is revelation from him who ha created the earth and the high heaven
the all merciful settled on the throne
to him belongs whatever is in the heaven and whatever is on the earth and whatever lie in between them and all that lie under the ground
whether you speak aloud or in low voice he hears all for he know your secret and what is even more hidden
god there is no deity but him his are the most excellent name
have you heard the story of moses
when he saw fire he said to his family wait here can see fire perhaps can bring you brand from it or find some guidance at the fire
when he came close to it voice called out moses
am your lord take off your sandal for you are in the sacred valley of tuwa
have chosen you so listen to what is being revealed
am god there is no deity save me so worship me alone and say your prayer in my remembrance
the hour is coming but choose to keep it hidden so that every human being may be recompensed in accordance with his labour
do not let anyone who doe not believe in it and follows his own desire turn you away from it and so bring you to ruin
what do you have in your right hand moses
he replied it is my staff lean on it and with it beat down the leaf for my flock also have other us for it
god said moses cast it down
so he threw it down and all of sudden it turned into fast moving serpent
god said take hold of it and have no fear we shall return it to it former state
put your hand under your armpit it will come out shining white without any blemish this shall be another sign
we shall show you some of our greatest sign
go to pharaoh he ha transgressed all bound
moses said my lord open up my heart
and make my task easy for me
loosen the knot in my tongue
so that they may understand my speech
and appoint for me helper from among my family
aaron my brother
strengthen me through him
and let him share my task
so that we may glorify you much
and remember you much
you are surely watching over u
god said you have been granted your request moses
indeed we showed our favour to you before also
when we revealed our will to your mother saying

put him into chest then cast it into the river the river will cast it on to the bank and there he shall be taken up by an enemy of mine and his showered my love on you so that you might be reared under my watchful eye

recall when your sister walked along and said shall guide you to one who will take care of him thus we returned you to your mother so that her eye might be cooled and that she might not grieve and you killed man and we delivered you from sorrow we tested you with various trial you stayed for number of year among the people of midian then you came upto the standard moses
have chosen you for myself
go you and your brother with my sign and do not be remiss in remembering me
go both of you to pharaoh for he ha transgressed all bound
but speak gently to him perhaps he may yet take heed or even feel afraid
they both said our lord we fear that he may commit some excess against u or exceed all bound in transgression
god said do not fear am with you both hear and see

go to him and say we are both messenger from your lord let the child of israel go with u and do not oppress them we have brought you sign from your lord and may peace be upon whoever follows the right guidance
it ha been revealed to u that punishment shall overtake him who reject it and turn away
pharaoh said who then is the lord of you both moses
moses replied our lord is he who ha given everything it form then guided it
pharaoh asked what about the previous generation
moses said my lord alone ha knowledge of that recorded in book my lord neither errs nor forgets
it is he who ha laid out the earth for you and traced route in it and sent down water from the sky we have brought forth every sort of plant with it
so eat and graze your cattle in this there are sign for men of understanding
from the earth we have created you and we will return you to it and from it we shall bring you forth second time
we showed pharaoh all our sign but he rejected them and refused to believe in them
he said have you come to u to turn u out of our land by mean of your magic moses
we will certainly bring you magic to match it so appoint time between u and you in an open space which neither we nor you will fail to keep
moses said the day of the encounter will be the day of the festival and let the people assemble when the sun ha risen high
so pharaoh withdrew devised his stratagem and returned
moses said to them woe to you do not invent lie against god lest he destroy you by some calamity whoever invents lie is bound to fail
then they the magician conferred among themselves whispering to one another
they said certainly they are both magician who want to drive you out of your land by their magic and destroy your best tradition
therefore decide upon your plan and then come forward in rank whoever gain the upper hand today shall surely triumph
they said moses will you throw down first or shall we be the first to throw down
moses said you throw down first suddenly their rope and staff appeared to him by their magic to be moving about rapidly
and in his heart moses became apprehensive
but we said do not be afraid it is you who shall prevail
throw down that staff which is in your right hand it shall swallow up what they have wrought for what they have wrought is only magician trick magician shall never thrive come whence he may
the magician then prostrated themselves they said we believe in the lord of aaron and moses

pharaoh said have you believed in him before permit you he must be your master who ha taught you magic will cut your hand and foot off on opposite side and have you crucified on the trunk of palm tree you shall know whose punishment is more severe and more lasting

they said never shall we prefer you to all the evidence of the truth that ha come to u nor to him who ha brought u into being so decide whatever you will your jurisdiction only cover the life of this world
we have believed in our lord so that he may forgive u our sin and forgive u the sorcery that you have forced u to practice god is the best and the most abiding
indeed he who come to his lord sinner shall be consigned to hell he shall neither die therein nor live
but he who come to him a believer having done good deed shall be exalted to the highest rank
he will abide forever in the garden of eternity through which river flow that is the recompense for those who purify themselves
we sent revelation to moses saying take away my servant by night and strike for them dry path through the sea have no fear of being overtaken and do not be afraid
pharaoh pursued them with his host but they were submerged by the sea which wa destined to overwhelm them
for pharaoh had led his people astray and did not guide them
child of israel we delivered you from your enemy and we made covenant with you on the right side of the mount we sent down manna and quail for you
eat from the wholesome thing with which we have provided you but do not transgress lest you should incur my wrath we said he that incurs my wrath shall surely be ruined
but am most forgiving towards him who turn in repentance and belief and act righteously and follows the right path
when moses wa upon the mount god said moses why have you come with such haste from your people
he said they are following in my footstep while have hastened to you my lord to please you
but god said we have tested your people in your absence the samiri ha led them astray

moses returned to his people in anger and great sorrow he said my people did your lord not make you handsome promise wa my absence too long for you did you desire that your lord wrath should descend upon you when you broke your promise to me
they answered we did not break our promise to you of our own accord but we had to carry load of the people ornament and so we threw them into the fire for that wa what the samiri suggested
then he forged calf for them an image producing lowing sound they said this is your deity the deity of moses he ha forgotten it
why did they not see that it could not give them any response and had no power to harm or benefit them
aaron had already told them my people you are only being tested by this your lord is the all merciful so follow me and obey my command
they replied we shall not cease to worship it until moses return to u
moses said to aaron what prevented you when you saw that they had gone astray
from following me why did you disobey my command
aaron said son of my mother do not seize me by my beard nor by my head wa afraid that you would say you have caused dissension among the child of israel and did not pay heed to my word
moses said what wa the matter with you samiri
he said perceived what they did not see so took handful of dust from the footprint of the messenger and threw it in the calf that is what my inner self prompted me to do

moses said begone it shall be your lot to say throughout your life do not touch me and you will be faced with fate from which there will be no escape now look at your deity to which you have become so devoted we shall burn it up and then scatter it into the sea
your only deity is god there is no deity but him his knowledge encompasses all thing
thus we relate to you the history of past event and we have given you reminder the quran from u
whoever turn away from it will bear heavy burden on the day of judgement
which they shall bear forever it will be grievous burden for them on the day of judgement
the day when the trumpet shall be blown we shall gather all the sinner on that day their eye will turn blue with terror
and they shall murmur to one another you stayed only ten day on the earth
we know best what they will say the most perceptive of them will say you stayed only one day
they ask you about the mountain say my lord will scatter them a dust
and leave the earth level and bare
with neither hollow nor upthrust mound to be seen
on that day all will follow the summoning voice from which there is no escape and all voice will be hushed before the lord of mercy and nothing will be heard except subdued murmur
on that day no intercession will avail except from one who ha received the sanction of the merciful and of whose word he approves
he know what is before them and what is behind them but they cannot encompass him with their knowledge
on that day all face shall be humbled before the living self subsisting one those burdened with evil deed will come to grief
